HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: WHAT'S NEW? - Added a bunch of recipes to the Daybreaker statue which allow you to synthesise drugs in batches of 100, using half the regular amount of chemfuel - Biotech: Added the Diamond Dog xenotype and faction Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - New Storyteller: Sunny Starscout (more friends and less enemies) - Biotech: The Brony Xenotypes scenario now includes a changeling - All of the pony xenotypes now get along with each other - Changelings can now come in a variety of colours - Poison joke now has a chance of giving pawns the Cutie Pox - Added Alpha genes patch for alicorns and pegasi which will give newly spawned ones a shiny pair of wings Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? The Changeling xenotype has been added. * Acid Spray * High cold resistance * Pyrophobia * High libido * Fertile * Very ugly * Grey eyes * Bald * No beard * Insect voice * Facial ridges * Ink black skin * Robust digestion * Pollution stimulus * Great construction skill * Great crafting skill * Terrible mining skill * Terrible cooking skill * Terrible plants skill * Terrible animals skill * Terrible artistic skill * Terrible medicine skill * Terrible social skill * Terrible intellectual skill
